website_summaries.verdict: Colorful, educational ant farm geared towards imaginative and curious kids.
pros: Durable, stable ant farm designed with some color and personality to attract children
Kits includes sand, water dropper, and instructional guide
Use certificate to acquire worker ants by mail
cons: Not as intricate as other options
Some consumers did not receive sand

customer_reviews.title: Warning:  Can't get ants in Oregon or Hawaii
customer_reviews.text: This looks like it would be fun but the description fails to mention that the required ants CANNOT BE SHIPPED TO OREGON OR HAWAII. If you live in either of these states, you can't get the ants that the included certificate is for. It would have been nice if this detail was included in the description as it is printed on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kattirb

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the structure is good but I found that the ants can crawl out ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the structure is good but I found that the ants can crawl out of the top when you open the latches to drop in food or water AND it gets moldy after a week or two. I got a set of ants and tunneling sand another time and put them down in a fish bowl that they couldn’t crawl out of and it worked much better and we could look under the surface and see them in their tunnels much better!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia F.

customer_reviews.title: Good educational gadget !!!
customer_reviews.text: My son has enjoyed this ant farm since we got it !!! we ordered 2 sets of harvesting ants.... some how they made a queen out of 1 worker... I have tons of ants now !!!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: I'd probably buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this. I overfilled it (now I know!) and the ants moved the sand up to a mountain in the top where they can reach the top. The water dropper was not sealed so I put clear tape over the hole. I also think the other pusher-tool isn't good for much more than just pushing. To fish out debris, I use some hemostats. To store the tools, I took some clear tape and made some little holders on the back of the top portion similar to the straw holders on the side of a can of air to clean out your keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Emily K. Purvis

customer_reviews.title: Useless in Oregon and Hawaii!
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to get started with this project and the fun idea of "ordering our ants." Unfortunately, the very fine print says that they will not send ants to Oregon or Hawaii. So, I live in Oregon, and now I'm not sure how to get ants for this project or who to consult. I think it would be best if the company either a) chooses not ship to those states (OR & HI), or B) they should provide guidance how to work around the problem. I'm sure for the rest of the 48 states, this is a lovely item.
customer_reviews.author: N. Guest

customer_reviews.title: It’s a nice big ant farm BUT it doesn’t come with sand ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice big ant farm BUT it doesn’t come with sand or ant food. If I used the ant coupon I’d have to wait up to 30 days for my ants..... for $30 that’s pretty unimpressive and honestly my first graders would feel ripped off if I hadn’t ordered additional ants and have a surplus of sand.
customer_reviews.author: 1stgradersrock

customer_reviews.title: No sand included!
customer_reviews.text: After having several Uncle Milton ant farms, I thought I would try a different one for my youngest grandson. I should have read the description more carefully because it does not include sand like the Uncle Milton's brand. I also ordered the live ants before I let him open the habitat so he could put the ants in right away. Since we did not have sand, the ants died before we were able to get any. I'm now out over twice the cost of the Uncle Milton's habitat and I have a very sad little grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Ok container but beware of the ants.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice container. BUT. You have to buy the ants and if you use the packages recommedation then you will wait forever (2 weeks) for the ants to arrive. They all died but 2 of them within 10 days. As soon as the last 2 expire i will use my prime, pay a couple dollars more, and purchase ants from someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Graham

customer_reviews.title: Cool and Easy Pets!
customer_reviews.text: Super Cool! Follow instructions, set it up, and do some research to learn how to capture a queen OR just order some ants online and be prepared to be mesmerized for hours! Our 5th and 7th grader both love to watch the ants do their thing. There are some terrific videos on line of all kinds of ant farms and how to stuff, check it out, it's easy and by far the coolest thing pet wise we have ever done with our kids. Ants.... Go figure!
customer_reviews.author: B. Bryne

customer_reviews.title: Greatly overpriced and arrived in bad shape. Plus ants cost $4.00 more!
customer_reviews.text: Yesterday, I rated this product with 1 star because it arrived with no packing carton and a shipping label slapped onto the banged up box. I knew I had to supply my own sand for this $32.99 ripoff but I was unpleasantly surprised to find that the enclosed coupon to order the ants will cost me another $4.00! This toy is dramatically overpriced and has been a disappointment in every way...and I haven't even given it to my grandson yet. How could anyone possibly have given it 5 stars?
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great ant farm!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly and packaged well. I was able to order the ants online with the certificate came with it. The ants arrived in five days. I had to buy the sand and a local store. So far it is amazing the ants have already made several tunnels in just one day . My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Richter

customer_reviews.title: My kids had a lot of fun with this (ages 4yr-14yr)
customer_reviews.text: My kids had a lot of fun with this (ages 4yr-14yr); as did I! It was amazing to watch the ants organize their life, and was really easy to set up and care for. LOVED the red pegs on the bottom that help keep it from tipping over- it felt very stable. We donated it to a school classroom when we were finished with it, and they loved it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome! Kids and ants love it! FYI sand is not included.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad Kozlov

customer_reviews.title: No ant coupon, no sand...just an annoying return
customer_reviews.text: I was already thinking this was over priced because it didn't come with a magnifying glass but it was recommended by Amazon. No sand and no coupon to be found. Disappointing for my 3 year old and another task (return) for me.
customer_reviews.author: Karolina

customer_reviews.title: Items were missing
customer_reviews.text: Product didnt come with covers for the bottom of the frame which holds the sand and ants in. It's now 3 months later till i got around getting ants etc... to late to return!! And now I have live ants that I bought sitting on my table waiting to find a home... waste of money!! Do not buy! If you do buy make sure its all there before it's too late to return !
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loves it
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of research I picked this product. I liked it and it let me know I needed to order the ants separately which I did. However I missed the part about needing to order sand as well so don’t forget to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Leigh

customer_reviews.title: not practical to use
customer_reviews.text: The little holes in the top. It makes difficult to feed or water the ants. Was extremely hard to put ants in it. I had to frose my ants 3 times before I actually siped them in. I had to make cone like structure which I stick in the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Olya

customer_reviews.title: My 10 yr old daughter was so happy!
customer_reviews.text: I had a Milton Ant Farm when I was younger, which worked just fine. But I recommend this farm, which is bigger, sturdier & more colorful. Comes w/a certificate to order ants, which we ordered online right away. I was very surprised to get the ants in less than a week! We just used some sandbox sand we had, and we've been following the guideline book (though we only need to give them water 1-2 times a week so far). I'd definitely recommend this 😊
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kids
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter loves this Ant farm. We didn't use the 5$ off ant discount or have them shipped, because it takes 2 weeks AFTER you get the farm to get the ants. -.- We dug in our yard and filled it ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Reed Skin

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: It came without the plastic caps that keep the sand and ants inside on the bottom. Its pretty useless without that.
customer_reviews.author: melissa pearman

customer_reviews.title: Interesting for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: I think me and my husband are more interested then our two kids ( 10.5 & 6) ants have been in home for less then 5 hours and already see progress
customer_reviews.author: Natasha powell

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this ant farm. Cannot be better for display. fun to watch and kids go nuts over this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Webster

customer_reviews.title: disappointment
customer_reviews.text: It is a piece of plastic!!!!! and all the ants died in one day!!!! never buy !!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Cojuhari

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Was ok. Like product said. Ants could be seen and well looks like the box and as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: David Conger

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Not certain why its called a farm but granddaughter loved the one we got her. That's all that is important.
customer_reviews.author: Mike O.

customer_reviews.title: Holes in the plastic not escape proof.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t come with sand. The plastic had small holes around the edges making it not escape proof 3 large ants walked right out as we were setting it up. We had to cover 4 holes with tape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this is priced high to not have sand included
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Probably to old for 4 year old to understand process
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old grandson had trouble understanding why he couldn't see the ants when he opened this gift, he was quite disappointed. Then he couldn't understand the whole sending for the ants/ getting them in the mail thing. I'm sure when he gets the ants and they are placed in the farm he will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to order sand and ants with this
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good structure for an ant farm but it smdoesnt come with the sand, so make sure you order sand and the ants.
customer_reviews.author: Zero

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Great ant habitat. The kids loved it at first but lost interest quickly. I think my husband and I had more fun watching the ants than the kids did.
customer_reviews.author: Oosahwe4

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his ant farm! This one is a good deal for the price and is does not have a cheap feel to it like some of them seem to have. I bought the sand and ants through a separate vendor and so far so good! The ants are tunneling away and we add a little food and water each day.
customer_reviews.author: keenon

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it! Great product and would definitely suggest to ...
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it! Great product and would definitely suggest to anyone looking for a good quality an farm.
customer_reviews.author: scott bliatout

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift. My son is thrilled with watching the ...
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift. My son is thrilled with watching the tunneling. Wish it came with sand- it was hard to find in the winter
customer_reviews.author: Trjumom

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like it.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like it. It has no access to set it. Didn’t work for our ants. After the first use, we couldn’t use it again because it was impossible to clean it from the inside. It got humid and we couldn’t see nothing because of the fumes. We threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Hila

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with ants or sand... buzz kill at Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it 0 stars I would cheaply made and does not come with sand! 33$ for this pathetic! Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ava Walker

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old tons of cool electronic stuff for christmas - this was her favorite ...
customer_reviews.text: Got our 5.5 year old tons of cool electronic stuff for christmas - this was her favorite gift by a long shot.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco Cuffari

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and interesting
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my 4 year olds birthday and he loves it, so do I. It’s super fascinating to look at and do small experiments that come in a booklet with the exhibit. The ants came very quickly from the company and I bought the sand ahead of tile to set up everything so it was ready to go on his big day.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L

customer_reviews.title: We got sand from Home Depot and it’s not the best. I have to keep adding water to moisten ...
customer_reviews.text: Remember to add enough sand before adding the ants and find the right sand that will not dry out and ruin their tunnels. We got sand from Home Depot and it’s not the best. I have to keep adding water to moisten it so they can build.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: ants can be dangerous
customer_reviews.text: bought for my granddaughter. didn't realize the ants bite and sting. but she has had fun setting it up
customer_reviews.author: BBmoos

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 yr old daughter for Christmas. Our whole family loves it!!!! Educational and entertaining. Great product
customer_reviews.author: AlleyLee

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts from box
customer_reviews.text: I am missing the tunnel starter, the 2 foot pads, and the dropper. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Terry F

customer_reviews.title: Additional Items Needed
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice ant factory. When ordering online you need to tell consumers that the ant factory does not come with ant food ,sand and that when ordering ants it requires an additional cost. I have ordered ant farms before and everything arrived together or indicated additional items needed..
customer_reviews.author: Carol Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Go with the gel not sand
customer_reviews.text: I would buy a gel one. It's a real cool farm. Does not include sand. It's a lot more trouble to set up than I initially thought. Keeping the sand moist but not too wet and the ants feed is not as easy as it sounds. The sand kinda slicks to the side and u can't see all the way through 1/2 the tunnels.
customer_reviews.author: Cate B.

customer_reviews.title: Works well but ants did escape a couple times
customer_reviews.text: Every now and again an ant would escape. Needs a tights snap on the top lid.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Jenke

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for children, and even some adults!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift, child loved it. Ordered live ants so we could set it up right away and by the end of Christmas Eve dinner, they had already started tunneling. Only real issue is it didn’t come with sand.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa J. Marcell

customer_reviews.title: My grandkids love the ant farm we got them
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love the ant farm we got them. The farm was easy to assemble and the ants really went to tunneling once they were added. Our kids love watching them work.
customer_reviews.author: lp

customer_reviews.title: Would have been nice to come with starter sand
customer_reviews.text: Works as should. Would have been nice to come with starter sand. Ants building as they should.
customer_reviews.author: aaa12

customer_reviews.title: Everything about this worked well and my 4-year-old granddaughter is ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this worked well and my 4-year-old granddaughter is enjoying a very active ant colony in her room!
customer_reviews.author: TheDenverFan

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it!! He turned 7 so he got this as a gift and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I thought this was overpriced for what you got. ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was overpriced for what you got. It doesn't come with sand or ants. The plastic feet that the ant house stands on are cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jason T. Paciorek

customer_reviews.title: Big hit for our little entemologist.
customer_reviews.text: Great ant farm. No sand though, bought sand and ants from another amazon seller and have no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Unit is nice but....
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed for what you get for the price. The unit is great but there was no paper work for ordering the ants and you have to buy sand.
customer_reviews.author: jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Ripoff
customer_reviews.text: It is a piece of plastic. That’s all. No sand to even get it started. Just a $30 piece of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Steele

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for the price...
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my son as a gift... You have to order the ants separately...
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Great ant farm
customer_reviews.text: So far this ant farm has been so easy, we have have for over six weeks and all ants are a till alive and everyday we are amazed at what they do. My twin boys are three and they love it. Getting the ants was fast and easy too.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised the sand wasn't included. It is overpriced for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Please be a attention when you purchase. You need to buy the sands that cost more money.
customer_reviews.author: vv

customer_reviews.title: Kids find it interesting but it is expensive for what ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids find it interesting but it is expensive for what you get. You need to buy ants and sand separate.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: or your grandson will be bored and disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just remember, it doesn't come with ants so if it's a gift, order early and open so you can send for the ants, or your grandson will be bored and disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it's a very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Still waiting for ants to arrive, I believe this is week 3 and I have spent the last week winced wring how I'm supposed to obtain sand only to realize that it should have been included in the box, but wasn't. Hmm, guess I'll make a call.. Otherwise it's a very nice looking case
customer_reviews.author: V. Karandrikas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ok. But hard to feed and water. The ants block the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Norman B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Colorful
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Colorful, easy to set up, easy to feed and water ants, and easy to clean up after ants have died.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Chaput

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and Large ant farm.
customer_reviews.text: Very large and worth the price! My son loves it. Not the ants need moist sand!
customer_reviews.author: BIN

customer_reviews.title: Ant factory
customer_reviews.text: The Geosafari Ant Factory appears as though my daughter will enjoy it. The ants, I believe will be easy to watch. I'm disappointed that the required sand is not included.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S York

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good size compared to others I have looked at. My kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: C. May

customer_reviews.title: Missing Covers
customer_reviews.text: The ant farm arrived missing the covers to contain the sand. I reached out to the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: JMac

customer_reviews.title: Very cool, well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: When I got this I was ecstatic. It's exactly what I wanted. I also didn't realize how easy it would be to capture my own live wants while digging up dirt for this! Oh yeah, you have to dig up your own dirt. Because this product doesn't come with dirt - even though it's in the picture... Oh well. the stairs are neat too, I'll be hiding food at the top of them!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with sand but it does come with a coupon for ants. Kids at my church love it. Definitely worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy definitely recommended it to any parents
customer_reviews.text: My 5yrs old enjoying his ant farm and so the entire family. Good buy definitely recommended it to any parents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sotisfied
customer_reviews.text: Really not satisfied with this product. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Escape Ants
customer_reviews.text: My grandson does love the ant factory but ants can somehow get out.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Need to supply sand yourself
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I didn't read the description carefully, but you need to purchase your own sand for the kit. Ended up buying sand at a pet store. Not a big deal, but just one more errand.
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Bad condition
customer_reviews.text: The picture is how it was delivered. Looked like it had beeen stepped on.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Explosive for my grandson!!
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend to all, quality is fine and it is a moderate price..the ants did not live over two weeks --a bummer...
customer_reviews.author: Robert Childress

customer_reviews.title: My son loved this. It was also very educational
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this. It was also very educational. Plus it taught him a little responsibility.
customer_reviews.author: DixonE

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to see what the ants are doing. Easy to dump out all the sand and ants and start over again.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: b-day present for my 5 year old. he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you want to wait 3-4 weeks for ants after you get the farm than this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sandey Parker

customer_reviews.title: Sand and ants not included. They do however give you a mail in certificate redeemable for the ants.
customer_reviews.text: Mini tools included (dropper and shovel) to help you with the sand.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Houle

customer_reviews.title: Fun While It Lasted
customer_reviews.text: Fun while it lasted, but all the ants died after about a month. My son grew bored with it after that. We may try red worms next. They live longer and are easier to feed, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: 20 years later
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these when I was a kid and they haven't changed. Nothing at all has changed. This may lead to some pros and cons however. I wished the ant shipping time would have sped up. Young kids don't want to wait a month to "play" with their present. *** Maybe order the ants a couple weeks before you give the gift*** I don't see sand... the farms used to come with it and now i have to order that or get some from my back yard. Seems like that should be included with the picture.
customer_reviews.author: jablob

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: wish it had a port on the side to connect units together for a bigger colony.
customer_reviews.author: cdp1480

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it, although send for the ants before you lose the paperwork!
customer_reviews.author: going bananas

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my grandson. He loves watching the ants make tunnels. However, we ended up gathering our own ants from outside (from a single colony) as the ones we ordered only lived for about a week. The 'new' ants are thriving.
customer_reviews.author: April Nowak-Tolen

customer_reviews.title: We are having so much fun with this ant farm
customer_reviews.text: We are having so much fun with this ant farm. We ordered ants,sand, and food from the website provided on the certificate. We received them in a week and not one dead ant in the tube! The ants went to work right away and are doing amazing! My kids and my daycare kids love watching them.
customer_reviews.author: CasyA

customer_reviews.title: Where's the sand?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my nephew for Christmas. Today I asked my brother if they had ordered the ants yet and he said they had not and that the farm didn't even come with sand. Surely there must be a mistake, right? I mean the picture clearly shows a plastic farm with sand in it. Nope - this farm does not come with sand. Basically I sent them a $25 chuck of plastic and now I'm going to pay to have sand and ant food shipped to their house (which by they way only costs $2 on Amazon...but shipping costs $8...right). Save your money for a different ant farm...one that actually comes with everything you need to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Shaw

customer_reviews.title: put the ants in the fridge...
customer_reviews.text: We've had the ants in the farm for about 4 days now and they're doing great, tunneling all over. It's been very fun to watch. Bought this as a gift for my 5 year old son and the whole family really enjoys it. My only comment is before putting the ants in the farm, put them in the refrigerator for 5-10 minutes. The farm comes w/ instructions and the ants come w/ instructions when they arrive. follow the instructions that comes w/ the ants!
customer_reviews.author: A. Wood

customer_reviews.title: GeoSafari Ant Factory
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift that lit up the eyes of my grandson. He has had ant farms before, but he loves this one. It was a big hit. To bad the ants aren't already with it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Samenow

customer_reviews.title: Ants cannot be shipped into Oregon
customer_reviews.text: I like the farm but had purchased it for a nephew's birthday and had it sent to Oregon. When we tried to order the ants we were advised ants cannot be shipped into Oregon.An ant farm without ants isn't much fun. It would have been nice if there had been some type of notice before I ordered it. Now I have to fuss with a return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FUN AND AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this last year and it was sooooooooo cool. We had a blast with it and will most likely order more ants this spring.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: We are having fun watching the ants build and design their habitat
customer_reviews.text: We are having fun watching the ants build and design their habitat! It is sturdy and the directions for use are easy to follow
customer_reviews.author: mom on the run

customer_reviews.title: Ants dwindling quickly
customer_reviews.text: Ants purchased separately have dwindled to at least 1/3 left after 5 weeks. Unhappy 6yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Grammie P

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Despite following the directions meticulously, the ants died within weeks. Seriously more than half of the ants arrived dead and there does not appear to be a way to remove the dead ants from the vial, so we had a lot of difficult questions from our 5 y.o. right away. They did not make very interesting tunnels. Also, it took the full 3 weeks for the ants to be shipped to us and we live in the northwest.
customer_reviews.author: Northwest

customer_reviews.title: Our ants were sick
customer_reviews.text: The ants didn't tunnel and finally died. We don't know how to replace them. We bought a second one for another grand child that worked great. This one is a dud
customer_reviews.author: jaysnana

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with how it was shipped
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed with how the product was shipped! It was shipped using the actual product box. A shipping label and marker writing covered the back of the box. Also, the box could have very easily been opened as the flaps are not glued shut. I love the idea of minimal packaging, but this was purchased as a birthday gift for my nephew. I was not impressed. Very disappointed. If you are purchasing this item as a gift, I suggest you pay a little extra to have it shipped as a gift. I am sure my nephew will absolutely LOVE his new ant farm.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I thought for what I paid for this they would send the sand to go with it also my ants were dead when they were delivered. a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't really like this product at all
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really like this product at all. Didn't come with the sand, had to pay extra for the ants and they all died in one day.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing needs to fix this
customer_reviews.text: The sand is not included even though it shows it in the photo and lists it in the description. Amazing needs to fix this. Amazon did make my order right, but I wouldn't purchase from this listing as it is false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: A. Glover

customer_reviews.title: Read the fine print: you need to supply your own sand (which is ridiculous)
customer_reviews.text: You have to be kidding me: they sent me the GeoSafari Ant Factory, and of course I bought the ants, but then they don't include the sand w/the ant farm? I live in New York City; where the heck am I supposed to find sand? I got the kids all charged for the ant farm, they're all in a lather that the ants are going to die, we sit down to build the ant farm, only to realize there's nowhere to put them, because the sand is sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Susman

product_meta.title: Educational Insights GeoSafari Ant Factory, Ant Habitat, Mail In Ants, STEM Learning, Ages 5+
product_meta.description: It's easy for kids to set up and maintain their own ant habitats. Ant Factory, measuring 15" wide by 9" tall, provides great lessons in responsibility, basic ecology, and much more. Each habitat includes a 24-page guide book with ant care and colony observation hints, as well as a water dropper, canal starting tool, and a certificate to obtain ants by mail (requires $4.00 for shipping, handling, and insurance).
feature_bullets: OBSERVE LIVE ANTS AT WORK: Perfect for budding young entomologists to set up and maintain their own ant farm habitats
INCLUDES: One 9" X 15" escape-free habitat, water dropper, canal starting tool, and 24-page guide book. Requires 2 cups of sand (not included).

ANTS SHIPPED TO YOU: Includes a certificate to obtain ants by mail (consumer pays shipping & handling). You should receive your ants within two to three weeks from the time you mail your Ant Certificate. If the weather is extremely cold, there may be a delay in order to protect the ants.
STEM LEARNING & TEACHES RESPONSIBILITY: Introduces learners to basic ecology and provides great lessons of care. Recommended age range from 8+ years.

AT HOME LEARNING ACTIVITY: Makes a great activity for kids to stay engaged, entertained, and learning outside of the classroom. We are dedicated in providing resources that keep your kids learning and having fun while at home

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
